name: Unnatural Fortitude
description: You have the ability to shrug off horrendous injuries, recovering from wounds that would have slain a lesser warrior two times over.
effect: If this hero makes a Recuperate action, roll a dice. On a roll of 6, they can heal one grievous injury instead of healing a wound.
additionalEffect: they can heal a grievous injury instead of a wound on a roll of 5 or more.
